text: wqatlu -ayha almwmnwn- almushrikin hataa la yakun shirk wsdd ean sabil allh; wala yuebad 'iilaa allah wahdah la sharik lh, fyrtfe albala' ean eibad allah fi alard, wahataa yakun aldiyn waltaet walebadt klha lilah khalisatan dun ghyrh, fa'iina anzjru ean fitnat almuminin waean alshirk biallah wsaru 'iilaa aldiyn alhaqu mekm, fa'iina allah la yakhfaa ealayh ma yaemalun min tarak alkufr waldukhul fi al'islam
